Source code for pyfemtet.logger

import logging
from pyfemtet.logger._impl import (
    get_module_logger,
    add_file_output,
    set_stdout_output,
    remove_file_output,
    remove_stdout_output,
    remove_all_output,
)




[docs]
def get_dask_logger():
    return logging.getLogger('distributed')






[docs]
def get_optuna_logger():
    import optuna
    return optuna.logging.get_logger('optuna')






[docs]
def get_dash_logger():
    return logging.getLogger('werkzeug')
